title: ➽Chic South Boston 3 Bedroom 1.5 Bedroom Available 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302251656', 'Rent: $4,895 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 08/16/2022', 'Pet: Cat-Friendly', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'Chic South Boston 3 Bedroom 1.5 Bathroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, Updated Appliances, Granite Counter Tops, a Dishwasher, Microwave, AC, High Ceilings, Fantastic Natural Light, Great Closet Space, and an In-Unit Washer/Dryer.', 'The building Features Elevator Access, a Gym, Yoga Room, Bike Storage Room, Lobby, Business Center, Garage, Off Street Parking, and a Secure Package Area.', 'Right in the Beautiful South Boston near Broadway, the MBTA, Carson Beach, and UMASS Boston.', 'Video Tour Available!', 'Off-Street Parking Available for Rent ($200 per month)', 'Garage Parking Available for Rent ($300 per month)', 'Cat-Friendly', 'Available September!', "Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit, and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)", 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com', 'Thanks for checking out my listing.', "I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!", 'To confirm availability for this unit and to see other great available listings please email me!', 'MBTA Access:', 'Bus: 16 Preble St @ Old Colony Ave (0.49 mi)', 'Bus: 11 E 8th', 'St @ G St (0.03 mi)', 'Bus: 10 E Broadway @', 'G St (0.31 mi)', 'Bus: 9 W Broadway @', 'Dorchester St (0.34 mi)', 'Bus: 7 L St @ Broadway (0.53 mi)']
